testcase.brief: The address space of non-routable subnet should be same as the routable subnet Platform Dependence BR100,BR200,BRAP330,BRAP350
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 2. establish vpn tunnel between eth0 of BR and CVG
Test Procedure: 6. Configure non-routable subnet on br:192.168.1.0/24 7. Configure routable subnet on br: 100.10.1.32/27 8. Configure a 1:1 nat policy on br, the address space of non-routable subnet are not same as the routable subnet ,check result 1 ip nat-policy nat192-100 type match-net inside 192.168.1.0/24 outside 100.10.1.160/27 9. Configure a 1:1 nat policy on br, the address space of non-routable subnet are same as the routable subnet ,check result 2 ip nat-policy nat192-100 type match-net inside 192.168.1.0/27 outside 100.10.1.160/27

step.desc: Configure a 1:1 nat policy on br, the address space of non-routable subnet are not same as the routable subnet configuration will failed and there are some prompt info
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy n_1 type match-net inside ${inside.test.subnet}/${br.lan.netmask} outside ${outside.test.subnet}/${br.test.netmask}"
step.log-match: -c -i "Nat policy n_1 inside subnet mask length ${br.lan.netmask} doesn't match outside subnet mask length ${br.test.netmask}"

step.desc: Configure a 1:1 nat policy on br, the address space of non-routable subnet are same as the routable subnet congfigutration will successful
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy n_1 type match-net inside ${inside.test.subnet}/${br.test.netmask} outside ${outside.test.subnet}/${br.test.netmask}"

step.log-match: -c -i "ip nat-policy n_1 type match-net inside ${inside.test.subnet}/${br.test.netmask} outside ${outside.test.subnet}/${br.test.netmask}"
